channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2025050498
item.description:
Report X-2025050498

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-24T15:13:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-30
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO OF DELAWARE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 2
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS SENT TO AUTOMATED SORTING SYSTEM IN ERROR. PACKAGE WAS REMOVED FROM SORTING BELT AND SENT DOWN CHUTE THAT CAUSED INTERIOR CONTAINER TO SHATTER. EMPLOYEE WHO NEXT HANDLED PACKAGE WAS INJURED FROM CHEMICAL. ALL SPILT LIQUID WAS THEN CLEANED UP BY DESIGINATED RESPONDERS USING SODIUM BI CARBONATE. ALL SPILL MATERIAL DEBRIS WAS CONTAINERIZED AND EMPLOYEE WHO ATTEMPTED TO DISPOSED OF DEBRIS WAS ALSO INJURED FROM EXPOSURE. OUTSIDE RESPONDER WAS THEN CALLED FOR CLEANUP.
